WinWinWonRules.Rule1: Win Win Won is a 3-reel, 1-row video slot featuring Ingot Bet selection and Multiplier Reel.
WinWinWonRules.Rule2: The game is played with 1 bet line (fixed), bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip} with a choice of Ingot Bet 1, Ingot Bet 2 or Ingot Bet 3.
WinWinWonRules.Rule9: A bet line win in cash is equal to the value shown in the "Paytable" multiplied by the bet size.
WinWinWonRules.Rule12: During any main game spin, the dog above the reels may nudge the 3rd reel. This does not affect the actual outcome of a spin.
WinWinWonRules.IngotBetExplain1: Player is able to choose either Ingot Bet 1 (cost equals to bet size), Ingot Bet 2 (cost twice of the bet size) or Ingot Bet 3 (cost thrice of the bet size) before any game is played.
WinWinWonRules.IngotBetExplain2: If Bet 1 is selected, Multiplier Reel will not be activated.
WinWinWonRules.IngotBetExplain3: If Bet 2 or Bet 3 is selected, Multiplier Reel will be activated.
WinWinWonRules.MultiplierReelExplain1: If Bet 2 is selected, Multiplier Reels will either reveal x1 or x2, and all wins for that spin will be multiplied by the revealed multiplier.
WinWinWonRules.MultiplierReelExplain2: If Bet 3 is selected, Multiplier Reels will either reveal x1, x2 or x3, and all wins for that spin will be multiplied by the revealed multiplier.
WinWinWonRules.SpinExplain1: Tap to start spin at the current Bet Lines, Bet Size and Ingot Bet.
WinWinWonRules.SpinExplain3: Press the <Space> key to start spin at the current Bet Lines, Bet Size and Ingot Bet. (applicable to PC version only)

SettingMenuHelper.QuitGameMessage: Are you sure you want to quit?
SettingMenuHelper.ReevaluateBet: Bet Options have been updated. Please select a new betting option.
